body:
> HTTP dependencies are not added
谢谢，的确是因为缺少HTTP相关的JAR引发的。我已经调试好了。

构建dubbo-2.6.7项目时，使用http协议通信出现报错Unsupported protocol http in notified url，是因为在项目中少引了		
```
<dependency>
      <groupId>com.alibaba</groupId>
      <artifactId>dubbo-rpc-http</artifactId>
</dependency>
<dependency>
      <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
      <artifactId>spring-web</artifactId>
</dependency>
```
I encountered the same issue. Dont know the reason for this exception.
这个问题解决了吗？修复的版本号是哪一个？不想用最新的
Hi, has `application.refresh()` ever been triggered or not?

In theory, a new ApplicationConfig instance will be created at here if there isn't any:
```java
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalStateException: No application config found or it's not a valid config! Please add <dubbo:application name="..." /> to your spring config.
	at org.apache.dubbo.config.AbstractInterfaceConfig.checkApplication(AbstractInterfaceConfig.java:216) ~[dubbo-2.7.3.jar:2.7.3]
	at org.apache.dubbo.config.ReferenceConfig.checkAndUpdateSubConfigs(ReferenceConfig.java:239) ~[dubbo-2.7.3.jar:2.7.3]
	at org.apache.dubbo.config.ReferenceConfig.get(ReferenceConfig.java:244) ~[dubbo-2.7.3.jar:2.7.3]
```

and then `applicaiton.refresh()` will get called to try to fetch configure data from the remote Apollo center.

So, I wonder if it's `application.refresh()` hasn't been called, or it's fetching data from Apollo center that failed.
Thanks for reporting, it's been fixed.

**OSGiHost** is a springboot app.
**OSGiHost**使用springboot构建

FAQ is 404
Previous issues don't have the same problems.And seems that there is one pull request trying to do something to resolve it.

FAQ打不开
以前的issue没有类似问题，只有一个PR似乎想解决类似的OSGi环境一的ClassLoader问题，但是7年前的。

It had been triggered, but dubbo cannot fetch properties that loaded by apollo config. The Environment's PropertySources here 
```
[ApolloBootstrapPropertySources,systemProperties,systemEnvironment,random,applicationConfigurationProperties,defaultProperties]
```
All Properties are defined in `ApolloBootstrapPropertySources`.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11222742/68007880-f455f700-fcb7-11e9-8ba0-6986ff065e26.png)

And Here's  `ApplicationConfig.refresh() `
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11222742/68008048-7ba36a80-fcb8-11e9-8cff-d3f134baa869.png)

If We config properties with springboot's `application.properties` or `application.yaml`, there's no  problem

Here's  [demo](https://github.com/chutian52/dubbo-test) to reappear this problem.
U should prepare apollo configcenter for this demo
How does that URL difference affect the zookeeper connection?
What's your local maven version?  Have you tried `./mvnw clean compile -DskipTests`?
Reopen if necessary.
自己写文档吧，dubbo是一个意外

@chickenlj 
I'm not sure

Use the default config-center, the timeout period is 3 seconds, this 3 seconds is used on the zk connection. When starting, the above exception occurs when connect zk exceeds 3 seconds.
see the class org.apache.dubbo.remoting.zookeeper.curator.CuratorZookeeperClient, line 78.
can customize the config-center, set timeout property value equal 60s to resolve the problem.
Configcenter timeout problem, default is 3000, increase to 4000 can solve the problem
我服务端改用dubbo协议的正常的
see https://github.com/apache/dubbo/issues/4621

> I am a developer from Alibaba and I build a GitHub collaborate [robot](https://github.com/AlibabaDR/Collabobot) which is a framework to collaborate with GitHub projects.
> 
> Currently, this robot has a component to report weekly status of a repo as a issue, like [this](https://github.com/apache/incubator-dubbo/issues/3152). This weekly report will summarize the basic data of the repo and overview of merged pull requests, pr reviews and new contributors which is very helpful to get the general picture of Dubbo.
> 
> This robot has basic services like data provider, event manager, GitHub request client, GitHub hook, web service and scheduler. But with weekly report function only, we don't need to have any access authority of the repo and the robot will only play as a community developer who knows the repo very well.
> 
> WDYT.



> Already deploy robot for Dubbo weekly report.

周报机器人罢工了，需要调整@Frankzhaopku

> @gaoxianggithub 我建议，首先确定网络是否是通顺的，你先通过命令连接VMWARE里的ZK试试，看是否能连上
> 
> 我在测试的时候是使用docker启动一个ZK，然后本机启动provider和consumer的，暂时没遇到过连不上ZK的情况

简单用中文描述一下踩到的坑（还在坑里没出来.....）：
（1）自从2.6.5 (Maven groupId为com.alibaba)升级到2.7.3（Maven groupId为org.apache.dubbo）以后，在provider.xml配置文件中对应的accesslog的配置项不起作用了。
（2）在升级的过程中做了metadata-report的配置，一开始怀疑是由于这部分的配置导致dubbo从config centre获取配置，但是后来发现去掉这部分的配置仍然无法记录accesslog。
（3）换过两个provider端的程序（考虑到可能由于application-name重复导致的配置在ZK中存在了？），从未配置过metadata-report的程序在升级到2.7.3以后也是无法记录accesslog的。

（4）远程DEBUG了一波，发现2.7.3里面的AccessLogFilter会从invoker的URL中取参数项“dubbo.accesslog”（通过变量AccessLogFilter.ACCESS_LOG_KEY），但是URL中根本不存在这个项，对应在URL中存在的是“accesslog”配置项。
调试2.6.5版本的代码发现是通过“accesslog”（通过变量Constants.ACCESS_LOG_KEY）的配置项获取对应的值。

（5）因此分析，可能是由于升级后的版本代码变更后，对日志这部分进行了调整。通过查阅其它issue发现有说根据官网文档配置的方式。后来参考[官方文档](http://dubbo.apache.org/en-us/docs/user/demos/accesslog.html)的Logging by logging framework小节配置了一波，发现能够创建配置的日志文件，但是不打印访问日志.....另外根据Logging by specified file path小节配置的就是原来的配置方法，不生效（不创建日志文件，也不打印日志）。


顺带建议一下：能否更新一下官网的文档？那文档太迷了....也不知道对应哪个版本。
github里面的wiki也存在文档不清晰的问题，有些配置区分admin.xxx 和dubbo.xxx，到底是啥效果也没说清楚....
希望Dubbo能越来越好，尽管Service Mesh被吹的挺厉害，但个人还是比较认可Dubbo，希望它能越来越完善。

```
   连接特定的 DNS 后缀 . . . . . . . :
   描述. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . : Hyper-V Virtual Ethernet Adapter
   物理地址. . . . . . . . . . . . . : XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX
   DHCP 已启用 . . . . . . . . . . . : 否
   自动配置已启用. . . . . . . . . . : 是
   本地链接 IPv6 地址. . . . . . . . : fe80::41a:xxx:XXX:56f7%26(首选)
   IPv4 地址 . . . . . . . . . . . . : 172.17.159.67(首选)
   子网掩码  . . . . . . . . . . . . : 255.255.255.240
   默认网关. . . . . . . . . . . . . :
   DHCPv6 客户端 DUID  . . . . . . . : 00-01-00-01-23-9C-66-3B-80-AF-B7-23-67-3F
   DNS 服务器  . . . . . . . . . . . : fec0:0:0:ffff::1%1
                                       fec0:0:0:ffff::2%1
                                       fec0:0:0:ffff::3%1
   TCPIP 上的 NetBIOS  . . . . . . . : 已启用
```

当没有使用config center时，dubbo会根据registry参数生成一个默认的config center，但是在生成的时候没有考虑到将timeout和group透传下去，因此默认的ConfigCenterConfig中的timeout为3000毫秒，在网络不好的情况下会有'zookeeper not connected'。

这样一来就无法修改timeout，只有显示的配置ConfigCenter修改timeout解决。

建议可以将registry的timeout和group传入默认的ConfigCenterConfig。

代码位置：`AbstractInterfaceConfig.useRegistryForConfigIfNecessary`

When config center is not used, dubbo will generate a default config center according to the registry parameter, but timeout and group are not considered when generating, so the default timeout in ConfigCenterConfig is 3000 milliseconds, and there will be 'zookeeper not connected' in case of bad network.

In this way, timeout cannot be modified, only the configuration ConfigCenter shown can modify timeout.

It is recommended that timeout and group of registry be passed into the default ConfigCenterConfig.

Code location: `AbstractInterfaceConfig useRegistryForConfigIfNecessary`

`InetAddress[] InetAddress.getAddressesFromNameService()` 1324行：`addresses = nameService.lookupAllHostAddr(host);` 是可以拿到所有地址的，

但是`InetAddress.getLocalHost()` 1512行 只返回第一个地址，
```
  cachedLocalHost = localAddrs[0];
  cacheTime = now;
  ret = localAddrs[0];
```

而带有“-Djava.net.preferIPv4Stack=true”参数时，拿到的是2个地址：
1：Hyper-V网卡地址
2：无线网卡地址（也是hosts中配置的地址）

不带“-Djava.net.preferIPv4Stack=true”参数时，拿到的是4个地址：
1：无线网卡地址（也是hosts中配置的地址）
2：Hyper-V网卡地址
3：无线网卡IPV6地址
4：Hyper-V网卡IPV6地址

带有“-Djava.net.preferIPv4Stack=true”参数时，Hyper-V网卡地址在前面，所以。。。

阅读源码后判断为，注册动作发生在invoker的可用状态判断之前。
当invoker不可用时，没有取消注册的动作。
在重复尝试获取invoker的时候，会由于refer为null再一次进行初始化。导致不断的重复注册。

Hi, 

I am thinking of reverting the logic in `getProperties()` in 2.7.4.1, as you pointed here, `.properties` is not allowed in Apollo, and that means 2.7.4.1 cannot work with Apollo. 

We listened to some developer's advice about the drawbacks of governance rules and properties files sharing the same `dubbo` namespace when preparing 2.7.4.1 and made the above change. 

But now having thoroughly thought of this problem, I think keep the logic in 2.7.3 would be the best choice, developers who want to separate those two contents can configure explicitly when using:
```xml
<dubbo namespace="governance" group ="dubbo"/>
```

Hi @makingtime , I am afraid that the  2.7.4.1`dubbo-configcenter-apollo` could not work properly with Apollo. Please see the #5298 for why we did the change and what we plan to do to fix it in the next version.

sample of dubbo.properties:

```properties
# main registry
dubbo.registry.id=registryMain
dubbo.registry.address=${dubbo.registry.url1}
dubbo.registry.file=logs/dubbo-registry-main.properties
dubbo.registry.protocol=zookeeper

# another
dubbo.registries.registryOther.id=registryOther
dubbo.registries.registryOther.address=${dubbo.other.registry.url}
dubbo.registries.registryOther.file=logs/dubbo-registry-other.properties
dubbo.registries.registryOther.protocol=zookeeper
# default not to register to it
dubbo.registries.registryOther.register=false
```

And you must specific the default registry to subscribe/publish in your <dubbo:consumer /> or <dubbo:provider /> if you don't want them working together.
And check whether there is different and conflict NETTY version(4.x) in the dependency tree.
